TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 与 事件结合使用，当特定 的解析请求完成时，就会终止此事件。

span.span: Used in conjunction with the event, which is signaled when a resolve request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 ResolveCompletedEventArgs 对象，实例化对象，并利用解决方法之一。To use the ResolveCompletedEventArgs object, instantiate a object and utilize one of the Resolve methods. 对于异步处理，使用方法。For asynchronous processing, use the method. 当解析程序已达到云到查询末尾，或它已达到最大的记录条目数它所构造、 引发事件以完成解析过程时，和关联的委托导致 ResolveAsync 才能完成。When the Resolver has reached the end of the Cloud(s) to query for the , or it has reached the maximum number of record entries for the it is constructing, the event to complete the resolve process is raised, and the associated delegate causes ResolveAsync to complete. 异常完成，不会返回一个集合，也可以引发该事件。The event can also be raised for abnormal completions, which do not return a collection. 仅在后，当发现的所有终结点后，将引发此事件。This event is raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 对此实例的解析程序对象的所有引用都都与提供的标记，它是为此异步解析请求的唯一的开发人员确定标识符协调。All references to this instance of the Resolver object are coordinated with a supplied token, which is a unique, developer-determined identifier for this asynchronous resolve request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PeerNameRecordCollection As PeerNameRecordCollection

summary.span: 获取要解析的 对象。

value.span: 要解析的 对象就是在特定 的 操作的响应中发现的对象。

span.span: The object to resolve is the one found in response to a operation on a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当所有云已被都查询的此对等名称，或在检索最大数量的对等名称记录时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when all clouds have been queried for this peer name, or when the maximum number of peer name records has been retrieved. 通过将放到对等名称记录集合引发此事件等待 OnResolveCompleted 方法的事件自变量。It is raised by putting the peer name record collection into the event argument for which the OnResolveCompleted method is waiting. 状态更改将唤醒该进程。The change in state awakens the process. 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 `null`；对于 `int` 类型的属性，默认值为零 (0)。Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type `int`. 如果未找到记录，`null`返回。If no records were found, `null` is returned.
